modName: DarkStar Textures - Bridges Roads and more
summary: Adjustments to the roads, bridges . . . and more; in particular rock, and edging textures, to give them a grainier look and feel.
descriptionHtml:
[img]http://static.skyrimnexus.com/imageshare/images/1603876-1323393918.png[/img]
This is a bit of an extension to the DarkStar Textures â€“ Armor mod; this is a similar granny tweak to road, bridge and related textures i.e. the edging and dirt cliffs as well as the rock. There were several rather low resolution images that I bumped up to 1024 or belter but I wasnt aiming at a HD texture mod rather a good visual quality in the style Im fond of.

As with any of my mods feel free to use any of my work as you like.
author: Loden DarkStar
